headline: Cell and Gene Therapy in Numbers: $1.2B in Zolgensma Sales, $1.5B Yescarta Revenue, 46 FDA-Approved Therapies and $2B Strategic Deals
summary: This report provides an in-depth analysis of the Cell and Gene Therapy industry, highlighting key company revenues, regulatory approvals, and market trends.
